text:
Hi!! I have a hubl template with a normal html form. When i click the submit button i go to an other HubSpot page with an other hubl template. It's possible to get an input value? Like in php uses ($_POST["name"])??

I DON'T want to pass or get the value for the URL.

Thanks for ur time :)

Well you'll need to submit the form somewhere. We have a HubSpot form submissions endpoint.

You may also want to set a cookie, because if you are navigating the user to a page that needs the data immediately, they may  request the page before the data they entered is stored
